thread.title: 'Junk' RNA could help fight cancer, researchers say

title: 'Junk' RNA could help fight cancer, researchers say
text:
'Junk' RNA could help fight cancer, researchers say Wednesday, April 04, 2018 - 01:57 
Researchers of Mount Sinai have found that RNA material from ancient viruses embedded in our genome could help the body's immune system detect tumor cells. Elly Park reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Researchers of Mount Sinai have found that RNA material from ancient viruses embedded in our genome could help the body's immune system detect tumor cells. Elly Park reports.
